location.name: Crystalspire Tower
location.description: A tall, translucent tower made of crystalline material that changes color with the time of day. Home to various mages studying the return of magic.
rules: Magic is amplified within these walls
All visitors must register with the tower guardian

characters.name: Sylvia Nightshade
characters.description: A mysterious human woman dressed in dark robes with purple accents. Her eyes are deep black and seem to hold ancient secrets.
characters.backstory: Leader of the Shadow Conclave, a group that believes magic's return is a curse rather than a blessing. Secretly affected by wild magic that's slowly transforming her.
goals: Find a way to control wild magic
Protect common folk from magical dangers

characters.name: Zephyr
characters.description: A small air elemental that appears as a swirling vortex of wind and light. Often changes shape and size depending on mood.
characters.backstory: Born when magic returned to the world, Zephyr is a young elemental still learning about its existence. Follows Elara out of curiosity and friendship.
goals: Experience everything the material world has to offer

description: Inside the shimmering heart of Crystalspire Tower, Elara Windwhisper stands alongside Sylvia Nightshade and Zephyr. The chamber’s walls pulse with shifting hues of blue and violet, casting prismatic shadows across ancient tomes and arcane instruments. Suddenly, the air crackles—threads of wild, uncontrolled magic flicker through the room, distorting space and time for a heartbeat. Zephyr whirls around Elara, its form fracturing into dozens of tiny, sparkling breezes, while Sylvia raises a protective ward, her voice low and urgent. "This is happening more often," Sylvia says, her black eyes reflecting the dancing lights. "The return of magic is accelerating—and not even Crystalspire’s wards can contain it much longer." As the anomaly subsides, the three exchange tense glances, realizing that the world outside may soon be overwhelmed by forces none of them fully understand.
